thread.title: Trump: I Don’t Like Tweeting All the Time, But I Get ‘Very Dishonest Press’
thread.title_full: Trump: I Don’t Like Tweeting All the Time, But I Get ‘Very Dishonest Press’

author: Josh Feldman
title: Trump: I Don’t Like Tweeting All the Time, But I Get ‘Very Dishonest Press’
text:
Trump: I Don’t Like Tweeting All the Time, But I Get ‘Very Dishonest Press’ by Josh Feldman | 7:58   video 
President-elect Donald Trump talked about why he tweets so much in a clip released tonight by Fox from his interview with Ainsley Earhardt . 
She asked if he’ll continue to tweet as president. Trump responded, “Look, I don’t like tweeting, I have other things I could be doing. But I get very dishonest media, very dishonest press.” 
And so, the president-elect said, “It’s my only way that I can counteract.” 
After the clip played, Newt Gingrich defended Trump on this and said that he may have “made mistakes,” but what he’s doing is “out in the open.” 
Watch above, via Fox News. The full interview airs on Fox & Friends tomorrow morning. 
[ image via screengrab ]
